ygData.subject: Re: Griffins
ygData.msgSnippet: Azreal a level 42 warrior took one on in East Commons - he had to flee.  He said that it conned blue to him but still hit him for 90 consistently.  Real
ygData.messageBody:
Azreal a level 42 warrior took one on in East Commons - he had to flee. He
said that it conned blue to him but still hit him for 90 consistently. Real
griffins can be found in West and East commons. Not sure if they are In
Karana as well, only ever seen griffawns and the like. They are about level
40 or 41.

Maline D'Assault
> "Klotzen, nicht Kleckern"
>
